content_description: Promoted Diwali sale awareness with festive creatives targeting shoppers aged 20-45 across tier-1 and tier-2 cities on Instagram.
Google Shopping ads for top electronics deals including mobiles and laptops targeting high-intent buyers searching for discount offers.
Automated email sequence to users who added items to cart but did not complete purchase offering 10 percent off coupon.
YouTube influencer collaboration videos showcasing new fashion arrivals for the winter season targeting style-conscious users aged 18-35.
WhatsApp referral campaign where existing customers share invite links with friends in exchange for wallet cashback on next purchase.
Facebook and Instagram story ads promoting a 24-hour flash sale with countdown timer targeting past buyers and lookalike audiences.
Re-engagement email campaign targeting lapsed premium members with exclusive early access offer and free delivery for 3 months.
App install ads on Google targeting Android users in metros promoting app-only exclusive deals and 20 percent off on first app order.
